author: theofil
body:
#### PR description:
 
  - adding python **_cff.py** and **_cfg.py** to run H7 in matchbox and LO standalone mode
  - matchbox cff/cfg have been made relying on Herwig7CH3TuneSettings for testing
  - no changes are expected in the output 
  - no dependencies to other PRs or externals

#### PR validation:
passed successfully the:
https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html
title: adding configuration files for Matchbox and standalone H7
